articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Scale AI confirms ‘significant’ investment from Meta, says CEO Alexanr Wang is leaving - TechCrunch
articles.description: Data-labeling firm Scale AI confirmed on Friday that it has received a "significant" investment from Meta that values the startup at $29 billion.
articles.content: Data-labeling company Scale AI confirmed on Friday that it has received a “significant” investment from Meta that values the startup at $29 billion. The startup also said its co-founder and CEO Alexa… [+1888 chars]

articles.title: New Pill Slashes “Bad” Cholesterol and Heart Attack Risk in Just 12 Weeks - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A new cholesterol-lowering pill may offer a breakthrough for those at risk of heart attack and stroke. A major international study led by Monash University has revealed a promising new way to help protect people at high risk of heart attacks and strokes. Rese…
articles.content:
A once-daily pill, Obicetrapib, significantly reduced both LDL cholesterol and lipoprotein(a) levels, two major but challenging contributors to cardiovascular disease. Credit: Shutterstock
